boardgame.description: What are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Escape the Room_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; games?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Escape the Room games began as digital adventures and quickly turned into real-life events all around the world where players are locked in a room and must uncover clues and hidden objects to escape. ThinkFun_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s version of Escape the Room allows you to bring all the excitement of these experiences into your very own home!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Mystery:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s 1869 and the town_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s well-respected astronomer has not been seen since the untimely passing of his wife. Recently, strange things have been happening at his manor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; loud and unfamiliar noises, an unpleasant smell, and smoke billowing from the observatory. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s up to you and your guests to solve the mystery at the Stargazer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Manor!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Objective:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Spend an evening working with your guests to solve puzzles, unlock hidden clues, and unravel the mystery of the Stargazer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Manor. Will you and your guests be able to solve the mystery and save the astronomer before time runs out?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Used once. Everything repackaged into original envelopes per instructions on publishers website. Designed to be replayed, the only sign of previous use is that the seals are broken (and resealed) on the envelopes. Pnp £4 in the UK (weight 530g + packaging)
